title: Our Sectors
subtitle: Comprehensive Business Solutions
description: Explore our diverse range of specialized sectors

elevator.title: Elevator Sector
elevator.description: Established in 2006 AD in order to keep pace with the urban renaissance that took place in the Kingdom
elevator.details: Our elevator sector provides comprehensive solutions for vertical transportation, ensuring safety, efficiency, and modern technology.

contracting.title: Contracting Sector
contracting.description: Successfully implementing several projects, including residential, administrative and commercial buildings and other civil works in the public and private sectors
contracting.details: We deliver high-quality construction projects with precision and excellence.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing Sector
manufacturing.description: The National Materials Company (the industrial arm of Al-Othaim United Company) aims to carry out industrial and mining activities
manufacturing.details: Leading industrial and manufacturing solutions with cutting-edge technology.

development.title: Development Sector - Real Estate
development.description: A multi-faceted type of business that includes activities ranging from the repair and renovation of existing buildings or leasing them
development.details: Comprehensive real estate development and property management services.

investments.title: Investments Sector
investments.description: In the field of private investments, we invest with partners in purchasing shares in existing companies, help companies finance their operations and expansions
investments.details: Strategic investments and partnerships for sustainable growth.

hotel.title: Ajyad Hotel Services
hotel.description: Al-Othaim Hospitality is distinguished by its comprehensive experience in providing its services and investment capabilities
hotel.details: Premium hospitality services with exceptional guest experiences.

consulting.title: Next Consulting Solutions
consulting.description: Technology in the field of communications technology, Information, suggestions and solutions
consulting.details: Advanced IT consulting and technology solutions for modern businesses.

lowCurrent.title: Low Current Sector
lowCurrent.description: Projects, specialized works and modern systems
lowCurrent.details: Specialized low current systems and smart solutions.
